TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IPersonalizable

summary.span: 定义用于应用程序和个性化状态的提取的附加管理功能。

span.span: Defines additional management capabilities for the application and extraction of personalization state.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 除了对控件属性使用`Personalizable`特性之外, 还可以为应用程序实现其他管理功能并提取个性化设置状态。In addition to using the `Personalizable` attribute on control properties, a control can also implement for additional management capabilities for the application and extraction of personalization state. 例如, 需要管理私有状态信息的控件应实现此接口。For example, controls that need to manage private state information should implement this interface. 通过复杂的机制访问个性化数据的控件 (如自定义缓存解决方案、持久化到大型机的数据或 XML Web services) 也应该实现此接口。Controls that access personalized data through complex mechanisms, such as custom cache solutions, data persistence to mainframes, or XML Web services, should also implement this interface. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不应根据在 App_Code 目录中定义的类添加类型, 而是依赖于默认的二进制序列化机制。You should not add types based on classes defined in the App_Code directory and then depend on the default binary serialization mechanism. 基于 App_Code 的项目由于其程序集名称可在随机时间点发生更改, 因此不能一直以二进制可序列化。App_Code-based artifacts are not consistently binary-serializable due to the fact that they can have their assembly names changed at random points in time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用接口。The following code example demonstrates how to use the interface. 该示例包含一个 .aspx 页面, 该页面引用名为`UrlListWebPart`的 Web 部件控件。The example consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Part control named `UrlListWebPart`. 下面的代码是该示例的 .aspx 文件。The following code is the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/IPersonalizableCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/IPersonalizableVB.aspx#1)] 下面的代码是自定义控件的源。The following code is the source for the custom control. 应将此文件放置在 App_Code 目录下。This file should be placed in the App_Code directory. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 键入一个名称来表示 URL, 然后添加以`http://`开头的实际 url, 然后单击 "**添加**" 按钮添加该 url。Type in a name to represent a URL, then add an actual URL beginning with `http://`, and click the **Add** button to add the URL.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property IsDirty As Boolean
public: property bool IsDirty { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示控件管理的自定义数据是否已经更改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the custom data that a control manages has changed.

value.span: 如果用 接口管理的自定义数据已经更改，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the custom data managed with the interface has changed; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件管理的数据已更改, 则会将该控件视为 "脏"。When data managed by a control has changed, the control is considered "dirty." 如果控件`true` 通过接口所管理的自定义数据已更改, 则该控件应返回。A control should return `true` if the custom data that it manages through the interface has changed. 如果控件从此属性`true`返回, 则在属性值提取过程中调用控件的接口方法实现。If a control returns `true` from this property, the control's interface method implementation is called during property value extraction. > [!NOTE] > 在处理 POST 请求的后一阶段, 个性化设置基础结构会自动检查此属性。This property is checked automatically by the personalization infrastructure during the latter phases of processing a POST request. 但对于 GET 请求, 不会检查从属性返回的值。However, for GET requests, the value returned from the property is not checked. 某些其他事件必须导致对任何控件状态将控件视为 "已更新", 而不只是要保存的数据。Some other event has to have caused the control to be considered "dirty" for any control state--not just data managed by --to be saved. 如果控件在获取请求期间可以将自身标记为 "已更新", 或者在某些非常特定的边界条件下的个性化设置基础结构在 get 请求期间认为控件 "更新 ", 则将始终调用。If a control can mark itself as "dirty" during a GET request, or if the personalization infrastructure under some very specific boundary conditions considers a control "dirty" during a GET request, then will always be called. 控件可以引用其关联的控件并检查属性以确定当前范围。A control can reference its associated control and check the property to determine the current scope. 控件的自定义数据的 "已更新" 状态应适合当前范围。The "dirty" state of a control's custom data should be appropriate for the current scope. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示属性的用法。The following code example demonstrates use of the property. 该示例的第一部分是承载控件的网页。The first part of the example is the Web page that hosts a control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/IPersonalizableCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/IPersonalizableVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第二部分是名 `UrlListWebPart`为的自定义控件的代码。The second part of the example is the code for the custom control called `UrlListWebPart`. 应将此文件放置在 App_Code 目录中以运行此示例。This file should be placed in the App_Code directory to run the example. 请注意, 源代码实现了属性。Note that the source code implements the property. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)] 在浏览器中加载页面。Load the page in a browser. 键入一个名称来表示 URL, 然后添加以`http://`开头的实际 url, 然后单击 "**添加**" 按钮添加该 url。Type in a name to represent a URL, then add an actual URL beginning with `http://`, and click the **Add** button to add the URL.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Load(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed

param.name: state
param.span: 包含从基础数据存储区中加载的自定义范围确定数据的 。

span.span: A that contains custom scoped data that was loaded from the underlying data store.

summary.span: 将自定义数据加载到控件中。

span.span: Loads custom data into a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法在控件上调用, 以允许它将自定义数据加载到其自身中。This method is called on a control to allow it to load custom data into itself. 它还可以返回一个值, 该值指示是否必须将控件的自定义状态写回到基础数据存储区, 而不管页面上的任何其他个性化设置数据是否已更改。It can also return a value that indicates whether a control's custom state must be written back to the underlying data store, regardless of whether any other personalization data on the page has changed. 控件可以设置自己的自定义属性, 并基于个性化字典中包含的值来执行其他内部逻辑。A control can set its own custom properties and carry out additional internal logic based on the values contained in the personalization dictionary. 将个性化设置数据应用于控件时, Web 部件控件集调用此方法。This method is called by the Web Parts control set while applying personalization data to a control. 还应注意 对象中包含的作用域和作用域属性的合并行为。You should also be aware of the merge behavior of -scoped versus -scoped properties contained in the object. `state`参数包含从基础数据存储区加载的自定义数据的合并表示形式。The `state` parameter contains a merged representation of custom data that was loaded from the underlying data store. 在 "范围" 中, 在页面本身处于范围内时, 先前添加的所有值都将可用。In scope, all the values that were previously added when the page itself was in scope would be available. 在作用域中, 如果与个性化设置范围关联的值具有一个值 (当页处于范围内时添加一个值), 当该页处于范围内时, 还会有不同的值, 则个性化设置基础结构将仅在`state`参数内包括范围内的值 (而不是作用域值)。In scope, if a value associated with personalization scope had one value added when the page was in scope, and a different value when the page was in scope, then the personalization infrastructure would only include the -scoped value (as opposed to the scope value) within the `state` parameter. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了自定义 控件中方法的实现。The following code example demonstrates an implementation of the method in a custom control. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述中的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run this example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Save(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.PersonalizationDictionary state) cil managed

param.name: state
param.span: 包含从基础数据存储区中加载的自定义范围确定数据的 。

span.span: A that contains custom scoped data that was loaded from the underlying data store.

summary.span: 在控件的 对象中保存自定义属性和内部状态信息。

span.span: Saves custom properties and internal state information in the control's object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 服务器控件可以将其自己的自定义属性和内部状态信息存储`state`在参数中指定的中。A server control can store its own custom properties and internal state information the specified in the `state` parameter. 此信息以一系列名称/值对的形式存储。The information is stored as a series of name/value pairs. 控件负责使用名称/值对, 在后续通过方法对控件进行调用时, 它可以识别。It is the responsibility of the control to use name/value pairs that it can recognize during subsequent calls made to the control through the method. 控件可以引用其关联的控件并检查对象, 以确定当前范围。A control can reference its associated control and check the object to determine the current scope. 自定义状态信息应该适用于当前范围。Custom state information should be appropriate for the current scope. 请注意, 添加到对象的每个值都应该与相应的作用域值相关联, 因为在合并和限定作用域的自定义数据时, 个性化设置基础结构依赖于这一点在将其传递给方法之前。Note that each value that is added to the object should be associated with the appropriate scope value, because the personalization infrastructure depends on this when merging and -scoped custom data prior to passing it to the method. 使用 Web 部件的标准 ASP.NET 实现时, 控件必须确保位于状态字典中的对象可以由 ASP.NET 类进行序列化。When using the standard ASP.NET implementation of Web Parts, controls must ensure that objects placed in the state dictionary can be serialized by the ASP.NET class. 在实践中, 这意味着:In practice, this means the following: - 基元 .NET Framework 类型、字符串和面向集合的 .NET Framework 类型 (如数组、数组列表、哈希表和混合字典) 会自动序列化。Primitive .NET Framework types, strings, and collection-oriented .NET Framework types such as arrays, array lists, hash tables, and hybrid dictionaries, are automatically serializable. - 提供自己的类的自定义类型, 这些类可以序列化和反序列化字符串。Custom types that supply their own classes capable of serializing to and deserializing from strings are considered serializable. - 可由类进行序列化的自定义类型被视为可序列化。Custom types that can be serialized by the class are considered serializable. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不应根据在 App_Code 目录中定义的类添加类型, 而是依赖于默认的二进制序列化机制。You should not add types based on classes defined in the App_Code directory and then depend on the default binary serialization mechanism. 基于 App_Code 的项目由于其程序集名称可在随机时间点发生更改, 因此不能一直以二进制可序列化。App_Code-based artifacts are not consistently binary-serializable due to the fact that they can have their assembly names changed at random points in time. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何在自定义控件中实现方法。The following code example demonstrates implementing the method in a custom control. 有关运行此示例所需的完整代码, 请参阅类概述中的 "示例" 部分。For the full code required to run this example, see the Example section in the class overview. [!code-csharp[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/CS/urllistwebpart.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_IPersonalizable_Overview/VB/urllistwebpart.vb#2)]
